tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten büyük olmak için, insanların yanlarında durmak gerekir, üzerlerinde değil.
tr_quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Bir lider, istese de istemese de yaptıklarıyla bir örnektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Emretmeden yönetebiliyorsanız lidersiniz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinde akıl olmayanı, akılla yönetemezsin.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Lider dediğin önde yürüyen değil, yol gösteren olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: M.K.Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadan önderlik edin. Bırakın diğerleri önde olduklarını sansınlar.
tr_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

tr_quotes.quote: Vizyon, görülemez olan şeyleri görebilme sanatıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

tr_quotes.quote: Lider sabırla öğretir. Sabırsız yönetici lider değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Aguaydo

tr_quotes.quote: Lider, yalnız gösterileni değil, özellikle gösterilmeyeni görebilene derler.
tr_quotes.author: M.C.Forbes

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları yönetmezsiniz, işleri yönetirsiniz. İnsanlara liderlik edersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Grace Hopper

tr_quotes.quote: Toplumsal gelişmenin de, çürümenin de temelinde, yöneticilerin tavırları yatar.
tr_quotes.author: M.K.Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Kaptanın, karşılaştığı fırtınalara değil, gemiyi limana getirip getirmediğine bakılır.
tr_quotes.author: William McFee

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer ülkeni kurtaracak bir lider beklemekteysen, ben size hiçbir şey öğretememişim demektir.
tr_quotes.author: M.K.Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Benim işim insanlara iyi davranmak değil. Benim işim onları geliştirmek.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: En az yöneten devlet, en iyi devlettir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük bir milleti yönetmek, küçük bir balık pişirmek gibidir. Fazla kurcalarsanız, mahvedersiniz!
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir birey lider olmak istiyorsa, tartışmasız o hiçbir şey için durmaz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

tr_quotes.quote: Emretmeyi bilmek için itaat etmeyi bilmelidir deniliyor, bana kalırsa kırk yıl itaat eden bir insan, artık komuta etmeye kabiliyetli değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

tr_quotes.quote: At sırtında dünyayı fethetmek kolaydır. Zor olan inip onu yönetmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Cengiz Han

tr_quotes.quote: Liderlerin kalitesini anlamanın en kısa yolu, etrafındaki kişilere bakmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Nicola Machiavelli

tr_quotes.quote: Bir iş adamının kararları sahip olduğu bilgiden öteye gidemez.
tr_quotes.author: R.P.Lamont

tr_quotes.quote: Lider dediğin önde yürüyen değil, yol gösteren olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Kendine güvenen herkes dünyayı yönetebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir büyük yönetici veya lider cennetten düşmemiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi liderler, iş bittiğinde insanların bu işi biz başardık diyebilmelerini sağlayan kişidir.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi lider en iyi umut taciridir.
tr_quotes.author: Napolyon Bonapart

tr_quotes.quote: Birlikte çalıştığın insanlara iyi hisler besleyemezsen, hiçbir zaman başarılı bir lider olamazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Schwab

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer heyecan üretemezseniz, pek fazla şey üretemezsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: John Willard Marriott

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadan yürüyenler, asla yönetici olamazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Atilla

tr_quotes.quote: Liderlik harekettir, konum değil.
tr_quotes.author: Donald H. McGannon

tr_quotes.quote: Yöneticiler işleri doğru yapar. Liderler doğru işleri yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

tr_quotes.quote: Gelecek yüzyıl güçlü liderlerin değil, güçlendiren liderlerin yüzyılı olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Bill Gates

tr_quotes.quote: İşi doğru yapana yönetici; doğru işi yapana lider denir.
tr_quotes.author: Warner Bennis

tr_quotes.quote: Liderler insanları ulaşmak istedikleri yere götürür. Büyük bir lider ise gitmek istedikleri yere değil gitmeleri gereken yere ulaştırır.
tr_quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

tr_quotes.quote: Liderlik, yapılmasını arzu ettiği şeyi, sanki kendileri arzu ediyormuşcasına başkalarına yaptırabilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

tr_quotes.quote: Bir iş iyi gidiyorsa, bilin ki zamanında birisi cesur bir karar vermiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi tanıyıp ifade etmek, onu inkâr etmekten çok daha kolaydır ve başarırsanız liderlikte ödüllendirilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Warren Bennis

tr_quotes.quote: Çok söyleyen değil, çok iş yapan yöneticiye muhtaçsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi kendimize egemen olmayı öğreten yönetim, en iyi yönetimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi liderler, kendilerini geçecek takipçiler yetiştirirler.
tr_quotes.author: Alan L.McGinnis

tr_quotes.quote: Lider olmak için rol üstlenmenize gerek yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Bin asker toplamak kolaysa da onlara bir general bulmak zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Japon Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Ortalama liderler çıtayı kendileri için yükseltirler; iyi liderler çıtayı başkaları için yükseltirler; büyük liderler kendi çıtalarını yükseltmeleri için diğerlerine ilham verirler.
tr_quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

tr_quotes.quote: Olağanüstü liderler çalışanlarının kendilerine olan güvenlerini arttırmak için ellerinden geleni yapmalıdır. İnsanlar kendi yeteneklerine güvendikleri zaman başaramayacakları iş yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Sam Walton

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir lider, halkına annelik babalık şefkati ile hizmet edendir.
tr_quotes.author: 2. Abdülhamid

tr_quotes.quote: Yönetim başarı merdivenlerinin tırmanılmasındaki verimliliktir, merdivenin duvara dayalı olup olmadığını liderlik belirler.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

tr_quotes.quote: İşaret ederek ve insanlara gitmeleri gereken yerleri söyleyerek lider olamazsınız. O yere gidip, konuyu ele alırsanız lider olursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Ken Kesey

tr_quotes.quote: Lider,cezalandırırken yavaş, ödüllendirirken hızlı olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ovid

tr_quotes.quote: Bir liderin başlıca fonksiyonu, ümitleri canlı tutmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: John W. Gardner

tr_quotes.quote: Liderler, motivasyonu kendileri yaratmazlar, yalnızca kilidini açarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Gardner

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is a way of thinking, a way of acting and, most importantly, a way of communicating
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: Hold yourself responsible for a higher standard than anybody expects of you. Never excuse yourself
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: The greatest gift of leadership is a boss who wants you to be successful
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion
en_quotes.author: Alexander the Great

en_quotes.quote: You don't lead by hitting people over the head - that's assault, not leadership
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been
en_quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

en_quotes.quote: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: There is no greater name for a leader than mother or father. There is no leadership more important than parenthood
en_quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

en_quotes.quote: A man always has two reasons for doing anything: a good reason and the real reason
en_quotes.author: J. P. Morgan

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is a potent combination of strategy and character. But if you must be without one, be without the strategy
en_quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

en_quotes.quote: The world needs new leadership, but the new leadership is about working together
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it
en_quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better
en_quotes.author: Bill Bradley

en_quotes.quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership
en_quotes.author: James Humes

en_quotes.quote: The key to successful leadership today is influence, not authority
en_quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

en_quotes.quote: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: It is better to have a lion at the head of an army of sheep, than a sheep at the head of an army of lions
en_quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

en_quotes.quote: If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade
en_quotes.author: Tom Peters

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is not about the next election, it's about the next generation
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: When your values are clear to you, making decisions becomes easier
en_quotes.author: Roy E. Disney

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is a choice, not a position
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: The growth and development of people is the highest calling of leadership
en_quotes.author: Harvey S. Firestone

en_quotes.quote: At the heart of great leadership is a curious mind, heart, and spirit
en_quotes.author: Chip Conley

en_quotes.quote: I start with the premise that the function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers
en_quotes.author: Ralph Nader

en_quotes.quote: Effective leadership is putting first things first. Effective management is discipline, carrying it out
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: Effective leadership is not about making speeches or being liked; leadership is defined by results not attributes
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: It is rare to find a business partner who is selfless. If you are lucky it happens once in a lifetime
en_quotes.author: Michael Eisner

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is about being a servant first
en_quotes.author: Allen West

en_quotes.quote: The cautious seldom err
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: One thing that somebody told me is that leadership is a lonely role - some people can do it, and some people can't
en_quotes.author: Kyrie Irving

en_quotes.quote: Leadership - leadership is about taking responsibility, not making excuses
en_quotes.author: Mitt Romney

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is service to others
en_quotes.author: Denise Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is not about you; it's about investing in the growth of others
en_quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

en_quotes.quote: You have to think anyway, so why not think big?
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: Obstacles are things a person sees when he takes his eyes off his goal
en_quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

en_quotes.quote: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles; but today it means getting along with people
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Where there is no vision, there is no hope
en_quotes.author: George Washington Carver

en_quotes.quote: The employer generally gets the employees he deserves
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: If you care enough for a result, you will most certainly attain it
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers
en_quotes.author: Ralph Nader

en_quotes.quote: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: The only safe ship in a storm is leadership
en_quotes.author: Faye Wattleton

en_quotes.quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see farther
en_quotes.author: J. P. Morgan

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is all about emotional intelligence. Management is taught, while leadership is experienced
en_quotes.author: Rajeev Suri

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions
en_quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

en_quotes.quote: Leadership to me means duty, honor, country. It means character, and it means listening from time to time
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: He who is prudent and lies in wait for an enemy who is not, will be victorious
en_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

en_quotes.quote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is working with goals and vision; management is working with objectives
en_quotes.author: Russel Honore

en_quotes.quote: No wind serves him who addresses his voyage to no certain port
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: High expectations are the key to everything
en_quotes.author: Sam Walton

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is getting someone to do what they don't want to do, to achieve what they want to achieve
en_quotes.author: Tom Landry

en_quotes.quote: I have always supported measures and principles and not men
en_quotes.author: Davy Crockett

en_quotes.quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd
en_quotes.author: Max Lucado

en_quotes.quote: The first man gets the oyster, the second man gets the shell
en_quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Example is leadership
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is hard. It's a skill. It's a technique
en_quotes.author: Jocko Willink

en_quotes.quote: Leadership involves finding a parade and getting in front of it
en_quotes.author: John Naisbitt

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is an ever-evolving position
en_quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is a matter of how to be - not how to do it
en_quotes.author: Frances Hesselbein

en_quotes.quote: Leadership offers an opportunity to make a difference in someone's life, no matter what the project
en_quotes.author: Bill Owens

en_quotes.quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Management is about arranging and telling. Leadership is about nurturing and enhancing
en_quotes.author: Tom Peters

en_quotes.quote: It is the responsibility of leadership to provide opportunity, and the responsibility of individuals to contribute
en_quotes.author: William Pollard

en_quotes.quote: The very essence of leadership is that you have to have vision. You can't blow an uncertain trumpet
en_quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

en_quotes.quote: Clarity affords focus
en_quotes.author: Thomas Leonard

en_quotes.quote: To succeed, one must be creative and persistent
en_quotes.author: John H. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I believe in servant leadership, and the servant always asks, 'Where am I needed most?'
en_quotes.author: Mike Pence

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is an opportunity to serve. It is not a trumpet call to self-importance
en_quotes.author: J. Donald Walters

en_quotes.quote: Be the chief but never the lord
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Constant, gentle pressure is my preferred technique for leadership, guidance, and coaching
en_quotes.author: Danny Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Leadership and greatness comes to those who follow-through. Who stand for near-flawless execution
en_quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

en_quotes.quote: The test of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there
en_quotes.author: James Buchanan

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is more about clarity than it is about control
en_quotes.author: Mark Goulston

en_quotes.quote: To succeed in business it is necessary to make others see things as you see them
en_quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

en_quotes.quote: The role of leadership is to transform the complex situation into small pieces and prioritize them
en_quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

en_quotes.quote: If you want a quality, act as if you already had it
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Leaders grasp nettles
en_quotes.author: David Ogilvy

en_quotes.quote: People who enjoy meetings should not be in charge of anything
en_quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

en_quotes.quote: Taking on a leadership role doesn't mean that you only have to be personally ambitious
en_quotes.author: Jacinda Ardern

en_quotes.quote: I forgot to shake hands and be friendly. It was an important lesson about leadership
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: Character matters; leadership descends from character
en_quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is about doing the right thing, even if it going against a vast number of naysayers and mediocre people
en_quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

en_quotes.quote: The task of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there
en_quotes.author: John Buchan

en_quotes.quote: There are very few good examples of effective, nurturing leadership that unlocks people's potential or even enthusiasm
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: You were born to lead as mothers and fathers, because nowhere is righteous leadership more crucial than in the family
en_quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

en_quotes.quote: Great companies in the way they work, start with great leaders
en_quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

en_quotes.quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best
en_quotes.author: Chester W. Nimitz

en_quotes.quote: Leadership comes in small acts as well as bold strokes
en_quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

en_quotes.quote: Great entrepreneurial DNA is comprised of leadership, technological vision, frugality, and the desire to succeed
en_quotes.author: Steve Blank

en_quotes.quote: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton was the one who asked why
en_quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

en_quotes.quote: What I've really learned over time is that optimism is a very, very important part of leadership
en_quotes.author: Bob Iger

en_quotes.quote: A leader who doesn't hesitate before he sends his nation into battle is not fit to be a leader
en_quotes.author: Golda Meir

en_quotes.quote: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never
en_quotes.author: Duke Ellington

en_quotes.quote: Divorced from ethics, leadership is reduced to management and politics to mere technique
en_quotes.author: James MacGregor Burns

en_quotes.quote: It is, after all, the responsibility of the expert to operate the familiar and that of the leader to transcend it
en_quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

en_quotes.quote: We do not have a crisis at Freddie Mac, and particularly Fannie Mae, under the outstanding leadership of Frank Raines
en_quotes.author: Maxine Waters

en_quotes.quote: Power should be reserved for weightlifting and boats, and leadership really involves responsibility
en_quotes.author: Herb Kelleher

en_quotes.quote: We have to trust the voices of the community to be in leadership and know what we need for our communities
en_quotes.author: Tarana Burke

en_quotes.quote: The nicest thing about standards is that there are so many of them to choose from
en_quotes.author: Ken Olsen

en_quotes.quote: Everything rises and falls on leadership
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: How we think shows through in how we act. Attitudes are mirrors of the mind. They reflect thinking
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more than pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: Whether you empower one person or the free world, that is leadership
en_quotes.author: Julie Foudy

en_quotes.quote: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: I think leadership is not something you learn; it's something you discover
en_quotes.author: Myles Munroe

en_quotes.quote: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is absolutely about inspiring action, but it is also about guarding against mis-action
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: Charlatanism of some degree is indispensable to effective leadership
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is intangible, and therefore no weapon ever designed can replace it
en_quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

en_quotes.quote: Every time you have to speak, you are auditioning for leadership
en_quotes.author: James Humes

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is influence
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: You're only as good as the people you hire
en_quotes.author: Ray Kroc

en_quotes.quote: A throne is only a bench covered with velvet
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: If more women are in leadership roles, we'll stop assuming they shouldn't be
en_quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

en_quotes.quote: My observation is that women are merely waiting for their husbands to assume leadership
en_quotes.author: James Dobson

en_quotes.quote: Doing is a quantum leap from imagining
en_quotes.author: Barbara Sher

en_quotes.quote: It is not about gender, it is about experience, leadership, and vision
en_quotes.author: Angela Ahrendts

en_quotes.quote: The key to being a good manager is keeping the people who hate me away from those who are still undecided
en_quotes.author: Casey Stengel

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is not an indication of poor leadership; it underscores the need for leadership
en_quotes.author: Andy Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Absolute identity with one's cause is the first and great condition of successful leadership
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is something I was born with
en_quotes.author: Carmelo Anthony

en_quotes.quote: The great leaders have always stage-managed their effects
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: People invest in businesses that they believe have the leadership, mission and team to grow and operate profitably
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Lead, follow, or get out of the way
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: We need to make sure we're creating spaces to create new leaders and new types of leadership
en_quotes.author: Alicia Garza

en_quotes.quote: All of the things an arts education gives a young person enhance leadership skills and help raise grades
en_quotes.author: Josh Groban

en_quotes.quote: The legitimacy of the leadership depends on what that country thinks of its leaders
en_quotes.author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

en_quotes.quote: I think the greater responsibility, in terms of morality, is where leadership begins
en_quotes.author: Norman Lear

en_quotes.quote: True leadership knows not to go to extremes but knows how to confront and appreciate challenges
en_quotes.author: Lubna Olayan

en_quotes.quote: Servant leadership is the foundation and the secret of Sam Walton's ability to achieve team synergy
en_quotes.author: Michael Bergdahl

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is inspiring extraordinary people to step up and serve their country
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: I never saw myself as an individual who had any particular leadership powers
en_quotes.author: Angela Davis

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is about vision and responsibility, not power. And I try to model that in all of my interactions
en_quotes.author: Seth Berkley

en_quotes.quote: The cost of leadership is self-interest
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is not a quantitative thing. People either smell it in you, or they don't
en_quotes.author: Sergio Marchionne

en_quotes.quote: Well, I think that - I think leadership's always been about two main things: imagination and courage
en_quotes.author: Paul Keating

en_quotes.quote: I'm not giving up politics entirely - I'm just giving up leadership of a political party
en_quotes.author: Nigel Farage

en_quotes.quote: Strong convictions precede great actions
en_quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is about making the right decision and the best decision before, sometimes, it becomes entirely popular
en_quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

en_quotes.quote: You have to lead people gently toward what they already know is right
en_quotes.author: Phil Crosby

en_quotes.quote: Different times need different types of leadership
en_quotes.author: Park Geun-hye

en_quotes.quote: Leadership in telecommunications is also essential, since we are now in the age of e-commerce
en_quotes.author: Michael Oxley

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is the key to 99 percent of all successful efforts
en_quotes.author: Erskine Bowles

en_quotes.quote: In the South, there was absence of any leadership corresponding in breadth and courage to that of Abraham Lincoln
en_quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

en_quotes.quote: In fair weather prepare for foul
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Don't necessarily avoid sharp edges. Occasionally they are necessary to leadership
en_quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

en_quotes.quote: To have long term success as a coach or in any position of leadership, you have to be obsessed in some way
en_quotes.author: Pat Riley

en_quotes.quote: Turnaround or growth, it's getting your people focused on the goal that is still the job of leadership
en_quotes.author: Anne M. Mulcahy

en_quotes.quote: To my mind the election was stolen by George Bush and we have been suffering ever since under this man's leadership
en_quotes.author: Jessica Lange

en_quotes.quote: I could always score goals. I loved that feeling of having your team look to you, that feeling of leadership
en_quotes.author: Alex Morgan

en_quotes.quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes
en_quotes.author: Tony Blair

en_quotes.quote: I think it is important for people who are given leadership roles to assume that role immediately
en_quotes.author: Bob Iger

en_quotes.quote: There is no finish line to leadership
en_quotes.author: Julia Hartz

en_quotes.quote: Leaders have to act more quickly today. The pressure comes much faster
en_quotes.author: Andy Grove

en_quotes.quote: Our business in life is not to get ahead of others, but to get ahead of ourselves
en_quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

en_quotes.quote: Problems are only opportunities in work clothes
en_quotes.author: Henry J. Kaiser

en_quotes.quote: Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned
en_quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

en_quotes.quote: We live in a society obsessed with public opinion. But leadership has never been about popularity
en_quotes.author: Marco Rubio

en_quotes.quote: It's only under Prime Minister Narendra Modi's leadership that the country can foresee a bright future
en_quotes.author: Nirmala Sitharaman

en_quotes.quote: The sharp employ the sharp
en_quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

en_quotes.quote: When placed in command, take charge
en_quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

en_quotes.quote: We in the press, by our power, can actually undermine leadership
en_quotes.author: Christiane Amanpour

en_quotes.quote: Democrats have no agenda, no plan for the future, and no sense of leadership
en_quotes.author: Jeff Miller

en_quotes.quote: Education is the mother of leadership
en_quotes.author: Wendell Willkie

en_quotes.quote: Leadership does not depend on being right
en_quotes.author: Ivan Illich

en_quotes.quote: What's great about our leadership is they welcome other ideas
en_quotes.author: Tom Graves

en_quotes.quote: If there is such a thing as good leadership, it is to give a good example. I have to do so for all the Ikea employees
en_quotes.author: Ingvar Kamprad

en_quotes.quote: I don't care tuppence whether I'm forced into a leadership position or not. I'd much sooner not
en_quotes.author: E. P. Thompson

en_quotes.quote: I look for what needs to be done. After all, that's how the universe designs itself
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: The leadership of Christine Rampone goes without saying. She is the definition of a what a leader is
en_quotes.author: Ali Krieger

en_quotes.quote: I have a different vision of leadership. A leadership is someone who brings people together
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: We needed to go back on the offense and offer clear leadership on Iraq
en_quotes.author: Condoleezza Rice

en_quotes.quote: Building followership and inspiration around female leadership is quite difficult to do
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Hyman

en_quotes.quote: Nobody knows better than I do what the pressures of party leadership can do to a young family. It tore mine apart
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: Clearly no one knows what leadership has gone undiscovered in women of all races, and in black and other minority men
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: If you command wisely, you'll be obeyed cheerfully
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Leadership in today's world requires far more than a large stock of gunboats and a hard fist at the conference table
en_quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

en_quotes.quote: Leadership has a harder job to do than just choose sides. It must bring sides together
en_quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Leadership cannot just go along to get along. Leadership must meet the moral challenge of the day
en_quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Leadership and management are not synonymous
en_quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

en_quotes.quote: Military school was great and especially great for leadership and then I spent two years in Vietnam
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a natural leader. I'm too intellectual; I'm too abstract; I think too much
en_quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

en_quotes.quote: The real leader has no need to lead - he is content to point the way
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: Recognizing poor leadership is a vital skill to help you achieve greatness
en_quotes.author: Lewis Howes

en_quotes.quote: Leadership desperately needs women
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

en_quotes.quote: There are many elements to a campaign. Leadership is number one. Everything else is number two
en_quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

en_quotes.quote: Leaders must encourage their organizations to dance to forms of music yet to be heard
en_quotes.author: Warren Bennis

en_quotes.quote: I helped to restore America's leadership
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: America is stronger because of President Obama's leadership, and I'm better because of his friendship
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: I think our leadership team is a highly accountable leadership team
en_quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

en_quotes.quote: I grew up with Microsoft. I know the leadership of Microsoft
en_quotes.author: Alan Mulally

en_quotes.quote: Music is all about leadership and there ain't really a lot of leaders
en_quotes.author: Young Jeezy

en_quotes.quote: We need leadership. We don't need a doubling down on the failed politics of the past
en_quotes.author: Paul Ryan

en_quotes.quote: Leadership cannot be taught. Either you're a leader by the time you're 12 years old, or you never will be
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is a trait; it's not a skill
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: The way I see it, what is going to come out of the moon activities is a respect for U.S. leadership
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: You have to keep on disrupting. If you let up the pressure, then al-Qaeda senior leadership will come back
en_quotes.author: David Petraeus

en_quotes.quote: Mahatma Gandhi was someone who demonstrated the tremendous power of leadership by example
en_quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

en_quotes.quote: Because of the president's leadership, every American will have access to affordable, quality health care
en_quotes.author: Rahm Emanuel

en_quotes.quote: Courage breeds leadership
en_quotes.author: Nikki Haley

en_quotes.quote: What helps people, helps business
en_quotes.author: Leo Burnett

en_quotes.quote: The next thing is: we can make IBM even better. We brought IBM back but we're gunning for leadership
en_quotes.author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I think that my leadership style is to get people to fear staying in place, to fear not changing
en_quotes.author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: The hardest thing in leadership is managing your own psychology, and yet it's also the least talked about
en_quotes.author: Andy Dunn

en_quotes.quote: Benchmarking is an ongoing exercise in any company that aspires for leadership
en_quotes.author: Anand Mahindra

en_quotes.quote: Getting in touch with your true self must be your first priority
en_quotes.author: Tom Hopkins

en_quotes.quote: My four years in the Marine Corps left me with an indelible understanding of the value of leadership skills
en_quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

en_quotes.quote: One of the early lessons that I learned in leadership is that it's the leader's job to always go against the flow
en_quotes.author: Dara Khosrowshahi

en_quotes.quote: In the conversation about women in leadership, male voices are noticeably absent
en_quotes.author: Adam Grant

en_quotes.quote: I recognize we will pay more attention when we have different leadership
en_quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

en_quotes.quote: Churches need to figure out how they will address the spiritual lives of their staffs and leadership teams
en_quotes.author: John Ortberg

en_quotes.quote: The first step in changing a culture, I believe, starts with the senior leadership team - and with the CEO
en_quotes.author: Denise Morrison

en_quotes.quote: You need to be strategic about how you define your leadership journey and where that takes you
en_quotes.author: Denise Morrison

en_quotes.quote: The world is starving for original and decisive leadership
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: The job of nation building, the job of nation leadership in a difficult, complex coalition has worked
en_quotes.author: Azim Premji

en_quotes.quote: I don't know any other way to lead but by example
en_quotes.author: Don Shula

en_quotes.quote: If you aspire to senior leadership, you're going to have to work hard. That doesn't mean you have to give up everything
en_quotes.author: Julie Sweet

en_quotes.quote: The essence of leadership is essentially taking the responsibility of trying to interpret the future to the present
en_quotes.author: Paul Keating

en_quotes.quote: My student days in PSG saw three Prime Ministers, two wars, taught us courage, resilience, leadership and optimism
en_quotes.author: Shiv Nadar

en_quotes.quote: I think that there is an element where leadership is lonely, but I also believe that it doesn't have to be like that
en_quotes.author: Alicia Garza

en_quotes.quote: My leadership will end the Obama era and begin a new era of American prosperity
en_quotes.author: Mitt Romney

en_quotes.quote: I always liked the idea of leadership and being a captain
en_quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

en_quotes.quote: Most people associate command and control leadership with the military
en_quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

en_quotes.quote: When it comes to creativity and to leadership, we need introverts doing what they do best
en_quotes.author: Christine Tsai

en_quotes.quote: The worst thing you can do in a leadership position is be something you're not
en_quotes.author: Will Muschamp

en_quotes.quote: I think leadership is just something that comes really natural to me
en_quotes.author: Carson Wentz

en_quotes.quote: Our world desperately needs real leadership
en_quotes.author: Daniel Lubetzky

en_quotes.quote: People are starving for truth and leadership
en_quotes.author: Chris Gibson

en_quotes.quote: We have to reform the entire political process. It's got to start with leadership by example
en_quotes.author: Chris Gibson

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is... to make sure you never limit the idea or opportunity
en_quotes.author: Kevin Plank

en_quotes.quote: Insight essentially means being able to see things other people are not able to see. This is the hallmark of leadership
en_quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

en_quotes.quote: I am a general. My soldiers are the keys and I have to command them
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Horowitz

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is a permanent part of the leadership landscape. It never goes away
en_quotes.author: Andy Stanley

en_quotes.quote: I think too much of my leadership is done the bad way
en_quotes.author: Paul Pierce

en_quotes.quote: Actions, not words, are the ultimate results of leadership
en_quotes.author: Bill Owens

en_quotes.quote: Your style can be an artistic part of your personal leadership journey
en_quotes.author: Caroline Ghosn

en_quotes.quote: I understand from experience that unity is easy to call for, but it takes the right kind of leadership to achieve
en_quotes.author: Steve Scalise

en_quotes.quote: Deloitte University is really about leadership development. Our people love it!
en_quotes.author: Cathy Engelbert

en_quotes.quote: America's greatness has always been demonstrated by our moral leadership
en_quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

en_quotes.quote: Isolationism is not leadership
en_quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

en_quotes.quote: Yes, America must do the right thing, but to provide moral leadership, America must do it in the right way, too
en_quotes.author: David Cameron

en_quotes.quote: I think with the right leadership on both sides and the right president, we can get a lot done
en_quotes.author: Raja Krishnamoorthi

en_quotes.quote: To me, it's about always trying to make decisions that reflect my leadership and who I am
en_quotes.author: Andrew Whitworth

en_quotes.quote: The American president has a peculiar leadership responsibility to speak out for freedom
en_quotes.author: Ted Cruz

en_quotes.quote: Well, I've ruffled a few feathers at all the institutions I've led. But I think that's part of leadership
en_quotes.author: Robert M. Gates

en_quotes.quote: China and India will take the global leadership on climate change: they are suffering for it
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Turnbull

en_quotes.quote: I have always believed women have so many natural leadership qualities. They just need opportunities and access
en_quotes.author: Aja Brown

en_quotes.quote: Inspiration is an underexamined part of political life and presidential leadership
en_quotes.author: George Packer

en_quotes.quote: If you can provide the funding and you get the leadership, you'll have a competitive team
en_quotes.author: T. Boone Pickens

en_quotes.quote: Jamal Crawford reminds me the most of myself, the way he goes to the basket. But they need leadership
en_quotes.author: Earl Monroe

en_quotes.quote: Voters go into the ballot box with big ideas in their mind: leadership, change, experience, hope
en_quotes.author: Kellyanne Conway

en_quotes.quote: A C.E.O.'s job is leadership, problem solving, and team building. I've done that my whole career
en_quotes.author: Bruce Rauner

en_quotes.quote: There are racial and gender implications to how we think about what leadership looks like in the country
en_quotes.author: Stacey Abrams

en_quotes.quote: We need leadership, and we need it now
en_quotes.author: Byron Dorgan

en_quotes.quote: I've never worried about payback. People are hungry for leadership that's not afraid of political consequence
en_quotes.author: Wendy Davis

en_quotes.quote: The House Republican leadership has simply run out of ideas
en_quotes.author: Jan Schakowsky

en_quotes.quote: I have been chastised by a president, I have antagonized and angered presidents, and I have taken on my own leadership
en_quotes.author: Xavier Becerra

en_quotes.quote: American presidential leadership never goes out of style
en_quotes.author: Monica Crowley

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is hard to train on
en_quotes.author: Ben Horowitz

en_quotes.quote: For many years, Myanmar's leadership was largely shut out from the world of international diplomacy
en_quotes.author: Najib Razak

en_quotes.quote: I have disagreements with leadership, I have disagreements with the speaker, but I have those one-on-one
en_quotes.author: Bill Flores

en_quotes.quote: I think the comments about me being a shill for leadership are beyond the pale
en_quotes.author: Bill Flores

en_quotes.quote: We know that companies which have more women in leadership positions have a better performance
en_quotes.author: Gillian Tans

en_quotes.quote: We all know business financial performance improves when more women are in senior levels of management and leadership
en_quotes.author: Beth Brooke

en_quotes.quote: I wanted total control and leadership. I wanted to buy the horses and choose the players
en_quotes.author: Adolfo Cambiaso

en_quotes.quote: President Obama, under your leadership, we do need guns to keep us safe
en_quotes.author: Tomi Lahren

en_quotes.quote: I want to deploy the leadership to meet the challenges that face us and to restore America's greatness
en_quotes.author: Paul Tsongas

en_quotes.quote: It's a different era. Our job now is to show leadership and vision and to help the next generation of artists
en_quotes.author: Karen Kain

en_quotes.quote: You have to have your heart in the business and the business in your heart
en_quotes.author: An Wang

en_quotes.quote: Leadership requires the courage to make decisions that will benefit the next generation
en_quotes.author: Alan Autry

en_quotes.quote: I am convinced that your Mayor must take the leadership role in education too
en_quotes.author: Alan Autry

en_quotes.quote: Leadership demands that we make tough choices
en_quotes.author: Alan Autry

en_quotes.quote: We had a military and political leadership at that period which was genuinely deluded
en_quotes.author: Neil Sheehan

en_quotes.quote: A big part of leadership is just being comfortable with the fact that some decisions really are only yours
en_quotes.author: Helene D. Gayle

en_quotes.quote: Leadership should be born out of the understanding of the needs of those who would be affected by it
en_quotes.author: Marian Anderson

en_quotes.quote: Without American leadership at the U.N., countries just continue to talk and socialize and spend taxpayer dollars
en_quotes.author: Richard Grenell

en_quotes.quote: Making those around you feel invisible is the opposite of leadership
en_quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

en_quotes.quote: Unfortunately, the Republican leadership in the House right now seems to have been strangled by the tea party
en_quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

en_quotes.quote: I am surrounded by exceptional women on Accenture's board of directors as well as my own leadership team
en_quotes.author: Pierre Nanterme

en_quotes.quote: Real leadership is leaders recognizing that they serve the people that they lead
en_quotes.author: Pete Hoekstra

en_quotes.quote: Because of Obama's ill-advised actions, the world has lost American leadership
en_quotes.author: Michael T. Flynn

en_quotes.quote: There is no substitute for American leadership and exceptionalism
en_quotes.author: Michael T. Flynn

en_quotes.quote: Leadership means forming a team and working toward common objectives that are tied to time, metrics, and resources
en_quotes.author: Russel Honore

en_quotes.quote: There is a crisis of leadership and governance in Africa, and we must face it
en_quotes.author: Mo Ibrahim

en_quotes.quote: There are many things that matter much more than an editor's gender in shaping the direction of the leadership
en_quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

en_quotes.quote: In this nation, leadership is dollars
en_quotes.author: Norman Lear

en_quotes.quote: Women in leadership cannot cry without raising a storm of commentary
en_quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

en_quotes.quote: I think the way to understand Teach for America is as a leadership development program
en_quotes.author: Wendy Kopp

en_quotes.quote: School boards can be a steppingstone to higher forms of political leadership
en_quotes.author: Wendy Kopp

en_quotes.quote: Teach For America is working hard to be one significant source of the leadership we need
en_quotes.author: Wendy Kopp

en_quotes.quote: While we need to provide leadership and stability to the world, we should do that through diplomacy
en_quotes.author: Kevin de Leon

en_quotes.quote: I've always maintained - a captain is only as good as his team. It is not about my leadership, it is not about me
en_quotes.author: Gautam Gambhir

en_quotes.quote: I learned long ago on the battlefields of Vietnam that in a crisis, there is no substitute for clear-eyed leadership
en_quotes.author: Jim Webb

en_quotes.quote: One must be convinced to convince, to have enthusiasm to stimulate the others
en_quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

en_quotes.quote: Leadership means setting a moral tone
en_quotes.author: J. B. Pritzker

en_quotes.quote: If people want to compete for leadership of a religious group, they can compete in piety. A chilling thought. Or funny
en_quotes.author: Mary Douglas

en_quotes.quote: It's up to you to define your own brand of leadership and your own version of success
en_quotes.author: Peggy Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is about encouraging women to break their silence and tell their stories to the world
en_quotes.author: Zainab Salbi

en_quotes.quote: President Obama chose politics over leadership. 'Hope' and 'Change' have become bait-and-switch
en_quotes.author: Lindsey Graham

en_quotes.quote: I do think the U.S. has a moral and political leadership role to play
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Esty

en_quotes.quote: There's a powerful tendency to overcomplicate the whole notion of leadership
en_quotes.author: Mark V. Hurd

en_quotes.quote: For me, leadership is making a difference. It's using your agency to bring about change
en_quotes.author: Melanne Verveer

en_quotes.quote: I vote my conscience first and my constituents next, regardless of the direction of our leadership
en_quotes.author: Tom Graves

en_quotes.quote: I am fully supportive of the strategy and leadership team at Valeant
en_quotes.author: John Paulson

en_quotes.quote: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership
en_quotes.author: Daley Thompson

en_quotes.quote: You have no power at all if you do not exercise constant power
en_quotes.author: Major Owens

en_quotes.quote: I want to organize so that women see ourselves as people who are entitled to power, entitled to leadership
en_quotes.author: Patricia Ireland

en_quotes.quote: We need more leadership at every level: federal, state, and local
en_quotes.author: Beth Macy

en_quotes.quote: The state treasurer has authority to weigh in and take leadership roles on taxing and spending legislation
en_quotes.author: Walker Stapleton

en_quotes.quote: Get the best people and train them well
en_quotes.author: Scott McNealy

en_quotes.quote: The very exercise of leadership fosters capacity for it
en_quotes.author: Cyril Falls
